content.question: Which of the following is the most important step to calm an adult in distress? (Select only one)

answers.option: Ignore their emotional state and focus only on tasks.
Guide them to take slow, deep breaths.
Force them to sit or stop shaking immediately.
Speak calmly and reassure without forcing responses.

content.correct: Correct! Guiding them to take slow, deep breaths is the most important first step.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answer is: Guide them to take slow, deep breaths.
